items.text: length once more, on the body, dabbed towards square leg
items.shortText: Roach to Tamim Iqbal, no run

items.text: a touch fuller this time, comes forward and pushes it towards short midwicket
items.shortText: Roach to Tamim Iqbal, no run

items.text: length, just around off, Tamim comes forward and blocks it under his eyes, bat-pad together
items.shortText: Roach to Tamim Iqbal, no run

items.preText: Dheeraj: "in that list you gave Sir Viv is at the top with 189 with the next best being 26. Ah!When wi had world class batsmen" -- Arguably the best-ever in ODIs
items.text: fuller on the stumps, tucked away towards the right of square leg for a quick single, Chase had a shy at the non-striker's end, misses and concedes four overthrows
items.postText: Roach holding is hamstring there. Not good signs for West Indies
items.shortText: Roach to Tamim Iqbal, 5 runs

items.text: length, around off, Liton defends it on the off side
items.postText: Once again, Roach is holding his right hamstring. And he walks off the field
items.shortText: Roach to Liton Das, no run

items.text: tossed up outside off, Tamim lunges forward to block, the ball takes the inner half and rolls in front of square
items.shortText: Chase to Tamim Iqbal, 1 run

items.text: short and wide, goes for the cut, makes a good connection but hits it straight to point
items.shortText: Chase to Liton Das, no run

items.text: slower outside off, comes forward and turns it towards square leg
items.shortText: Chase to Liton Das, no run

items.text: flighted, a touch fuller this time, Liton was on the back foot, flicks it towards short fine leg
items.shortText: Chase to Liton Das, no run

items.text: looks to come down the wicket but Chase shortens his length, pushed back towards the bowler in the end
items.shortText: Chase to Liton Das, no run

items.text: fuller, wide outside off, steered towards covers, a fumble but doesn't cost West Indies anything
items.postText: Kapil Joshi: "Wow. The list features Rohit Sharma four times. No wonder with three double centuries to his name in ODI he deserves to be in that list"
items.shortText: Chase to Liton Das, no run

items.preText: Keemo Paul, around the wicket with one slip
items.text: short of length down the leg side, helped towards fine leg
items.shortText: Paul to Tamim Iqbal, 1 run

items.text: length outside off, reaches out for it and steers it towards point
items.shortText: Paul to Liton Das, no run

items.preText: amzad: "Tamim missed 8 ODI's out of 12 odis played by BD team due to his injury. and scored 610 excluding today at an average of 76 plus...wish he could have play all the matches, he could be the first Bd player to scored 1000+ runs in ODI in a calendar year... "
items.text: length outside off, comes forward and punches it once again towards point
items.shortText: Paul to Liton Das, no run

items.text: fuller and wider and Liton crashes it past the cover fielder, opens the face of the bat at contact
items.shortText: Paul to Liton Das, FOUR runs

items.text: length outside off, was looking to flick it towards square leg, gets an inside edge on to the box
items.shortText: Paul to Liton Das, no run

items.text: length around off, gets behind the line of the ball and blocks
items.shortText: Paul to Liton Das, no run

items.text: length, angled on middle and leg, Tamim goes deep and works it towards midwicket
items.shortText: Chase to Tamim Iqbal, 1 run

items.text: short and wide, extra bounce, Liton goes for the cut, was in the air for a while but away for the short third man fielder
items.shortText: Chase to Liton Das, FOUR runs

items.text: moves across this time and glances it towards fine leg, with the spin, to get to the other end
items.shortText: Chase to Liton Das, 1 run

items.text: flighted outside off, Tamim comes forward leans into the drive, excellent placement as it races through covers, beating the wide long-off in the deep on his right
items.shortText: Chase to Tamim Iqbal, FOUR runs

items.text: on the pads this time, tucked away towards square leg
items.shortText: Chase to Tamim Iqbal, 1 run

items.text: fuller around off, comes forward and works it towards short midwicket
items.postText:
Kapil Joshi: "The only other player to feature more than once in the list are Warner, Taylor and Gibbs. Quite surprised not to see Tendulkar's name in the list. the first man on planet earth to hit an ODI double ton. "

Derek: "even with the debate about batting supremacy the two best knocks on it came in 83-84."
items.shortText: Chase to Liton Das, no run

items.text: length ball on the body from around the wicket, tucked away towards square leg
items.shortText: Paul to Tamim Iqbal, no run

items.text: fuller on the pads, flicked towards midwicket, Carlos Brathwaite there substituting for Hope makes a tumbling stop
items.shortText: Paul to Tamim Iqbal, 1 run
